text: John Pearce (born 3 May 1960) is a Canadian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Canada Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Toronto
title: John Pearce (equestrian)
